attributes.action: Have a meaningful debate on Vote Leave's breaking of electoral spending laws
attributes.background: Vote Leave have been found to have broken electoral spending laws during the referendum campaign. This has been largely ignored by government. Please sign this petition in order to for government to debate this and bring it to wider public knowledge.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by a "meaningful debate".

You might be interested to know that a petitions debate was held in September last year on a petition calling for Article 50 to be rescinded if Vote Leave broke electoral law.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/223729
